title: Nirmala Sitharaman urges banks to leverage UPI for growth
description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman emphasised the potential of Indian banks leveraging UPI's digital footprints to expand their balance sheets. She highlighted UPI's global reach and its significant role in digital payments. Sitharaman also urged banks to adopt technology for risk mitigation, customer service, credit assessment, and fraud detection.
